page.title: 16'COMEDY FOUR'
page.content: 'THE COMEDY FOUR' ARE A GROUP OF MEM- BERS OF THE WOMEN'S INSTITUTE WHO ARE TRYING TO KEEP THE LOCAL WESTMORLAND DIALECT ALIVE.THEY ARE IN THEIR 6TH YEAR. THEIR AIM IS TO GIVE PLEASURE TO PEOPLE,ESPECIALLY THE ELDERLY,AT THE SAME TIME HELP TO RAISE MONEY FOR ANY CHARITABLE ORGANISATION.NO FEE IS CHARGED WITH THE EXCEPTION OF TRAVEL- LING EXPENSES.THEY COVER AN AREA OF 40 MILES THROUGHOUT CUMBRIA AND OVER THE BORDER INTO COUNTY DURHAM, VISITING EVENTIDE HOMES, EVERGREEN CLUBS, STICK AND WHEEL, DAY CARE CENTRES AND WOMENS INSTITUTE MEETINGS. THEIR 1 HOUR PRO- GRAMME CONSISTS OF RECITATIONS, DUOL- OGUES AND SKETCHES, DRESSING APPROPR- IATELY TO PORTRAY THE CHARACTERS.
